header.title: Backend Software Engineer Intern | MS CS @ Northeastern | Distributed Systems, Cloud, Kubernetes

resume.summary: Highly motivated MS CS student at Northeastern University with **2.4 years of professional backend experience** at LSEG, specializing in **distributed systems, microservices, and cloud infrastructure**. Proficient in **Python, Java, AWS (Lambda, SQS, EC2), Kubernetes, Docker, and REST APIs**. Seeking an 8-month co-op (Jan-Aug 2026) to build scalable backend services and develop APIs, leveraging a strong foundation in **high-throughput data processing** and **cloud-native development**.

skills.items: Python, Java, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, C++, C#, Ruby, Rust
Distributed Systems, Microservices, REST APIs, Event-Driven, Asynchronous Processing
AWS (Lambda, SQS, EC2, API Gateway), Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQL Optimization, Database Design
Django, Flask, FastAPI, Spring Boot, Micronaut, Node.js, Express
Git, GitHub, Agile, Scrum, TDD, Design Patterns, Code Review, OOP
ETL Pipelines, Data Processing, Workflow Automation, Performance Optimization

bullets: Engineered **event-driven data pipelines** for 180+ countries, processing **7.5M+ XML compliance records** into standardized JSON at 40 records/second.
Developed **scalable microservices** using Python/Java and Micronaut, enhancing **Lambda-based API performance** and ensuring 99.9% data integrity.
Architected **multi-queue priority routing framework** on AWS (Lambda, SQS, API Gateway), reducing high-priority KYC/AML turnaround by **35%**.
Reduced request latency by **40%** through **batch processing optimization** and implemented security hardening with AWS WAF, IAM, and TLS.
Collaborated with 7 cross-functional teams, mentored 5 junior engineers, and achieved **zero-downtime migrations** for critical services.
Engineered **high-throughput Python data processing pipelines**, improving system throughput by **3x** through concurrent execution.
Designed **microservices integration patterns** and **API orchestration**, reducing manual interventions by **50%** through automation.
Optimized database query performance and **ETL pipeline efficiency**, reducing data processing latency by **35%**.
Developed comprehensive monitoring, scheduling, and **error-handling frameworks**, improving data extraction accuracy by **20%**.

projects.title: Orion Platform
projects.tech: Go, Kubernetes, Operator SDK, Docker, CRDs
projects.bullet1: Developed a **custom Kubernetes Operator in Go** for a PaaS, enabling single-command, environment-aware application deployment across cloud services.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **event-driven reconciliation loops** for automated PostgreSQL, Redis, MinIO provisioning, health monitoring, and lifecycle management.

projects.title: Port Management System
projects.tech: Django, MySQL, Python, Advanced SQL, Stored Procedures
projects.bullet1: Engineered a **database-driven maritime logistics platform** using Django and MySQL, featuring **50+ stored procedures** and 15+ interconnected tables.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **Dijkstra's pathfinding algorithm in SQL** for optimal route calculation, supporting multi-role authentication and transaction management.

projects.title: Kambaz Learning Management System
projects.tech: Node.js, Express, Next.js, React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit
projects.bullet1: Built a **full-stack LMS with a RESTful API backend** (Node.js/Express) and Next.js frontend, managing course content, users, and assignments.
projects.bullet2: Designed **modular routing architecture** with DAO pattern, session management, and CORS, featuring **30+ API endpoints** and 31 automated tests.
